snippet.title: Space Megaforce (SNES) - No Death Run on Wild Difficulty
snippet.description:
Full no-death/no miss run of Space Megaforce (aka Super Aleste, スーパーアレスタ ) on Wild mode (hardest/lunatic difficulty),  my final score was 5,433,680 points.  This was captured off a real SNES console playing the real cartridge, no emulation or cheats.

Stage Listing:
00:00 - Start
00:24 - Area 1 - Emerald Belt Jungles
07:14 - Area 2 - Super Battle Ship
13:17 - Area 3 - First Bonus Stage
14:52 - Area 4 - Pullman Nebula
20:42 - Area 5 - Cavern of Doom
29:00 - Area 6 - Second Bonus Stage
30:48 - Area 7 - Meteor Shower Zone
39:00 - Area 8 - The Ghost Fleet
45:51 - Area - 9 - Third Bonus Stage
47:44 - Area - 10 - Mirror Jungle
54:27 - Area - 11 - Turbo Tunnel
56:39 - Area - 12 - Alien Lair
1:00:58 - Final Boss + Ending

This game is incredible, it provides an intense, balls to the walls experience for a full hour and rarely lets up.  I'd rank this at the very top of the SNES shmup library, possibly even #1 based on what I've played so far.  Great music, crazy pacing, and just an all-around amazing game.

I enjoyed this game so much I went a step further than usual and went for a no-death playthrough.  It took the better part of 3 weeks and a lot of failures but I finally got it.
